name: esphome
description: ESPHome is a system for controlling ESP-based devices using simple YAML configuration. It compiles firmware, manages OTA updates, and integrates with Home Assistant, making custom smart-home devices approachable without deep embedded coding.

features.title: Yaml Configuration
features.description: Define device behavior with simple config files. No coding required

features.title: Ota Updates
features.description: Update firmware wirelessly over the air. Convenient maintenance

features.title: Home Assistant Integration
features.description: Seamless connection with Home Assistant. Perfect smart home pairing

features.title: Esp Device Support
features.description: Works with ESP8266 and ESP32 chips. Wide hardware compatibility

features.title: Custom Sensors
features.description: Create DIY smart devices easily. Endless possibilities

features.title: Self-Hosted
features.description: Complete control over your IoT devices. Privacy-focused automation
